title: can we auto level our abilties??
body:
at least the damn ulti none will say nah I won't level ulti at level 6 my q or e needs more points first EVERYONE NEEDS THEIR ULTI AS FAST AS POSSIBLE RIOT but I level in middle of the damn fight and I panic and the ulti maybe could have saved me if I could have pressed it but I can't it's grey and the level up point is there being useless

the time I have mouse clicked it I'd be already dead
the time I pressed shift+R or ctrl+R or whatever same thing actually this option is probably slower because I am used to leveling with the mouse

honestly fuck this company this could have been a toggle option since ages but instead we have 3 keybinding for fucking emotes because that's what do we need faster ways to BM enemy and not faster abilities availability

adapt to key bindings , in a fast pace game like league where every second counts , adapt to hotkeys that allow you to quickly level up abilities and use them.
personally i've set up my keybindings so that ALT+ Q/W/E/R will level up the respective abilities.
the alt key is directly beside the space bar , which is how i lock and unlock my camera 
so my thumb is always down there , ready to either level an ability or move the camera.
plus in a classic qwer game your thumb usually rests around the space bar naturally anyways. making the alt key to the immediate left a very fast option to hotkey leveling abilities.
riots hotkey system is incredibly flexible , they don't need to automate anything. i can be in the middle of a team fight and still level abilities without it hindering the process due to the convenience of their flexibility with their hotkey system. 
learn their system instead of demanding they  change it to fit your needs.
